summary:
On 04/26/13, a Call Center employee of the VA Maine Healthcare System had called the Privacy Officer (PO) regarding an incident in which Veteran A's results
were mailed to the incorrect recipient. It was the recipient's caregiver who had discovered the error and who had contacted the Call Center employee. The PO
called the recipient's home, identifying who he was and the reason for calling. The recipient's caregiver ensured the PO that the other Veteran's information was
safe, and she then told the PO what was included in the mailing: her fiancs appointment letter and the second Veteran's x-ray results, full first name, full middle
name, full last name and home address. The recipient's caregiver will return the second Veteran's information to the PO of the VA Maine Healthcare System.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
